message: I'm being generous, but I'm sure you understand the power of inflation. Accept this offer, and we can both walk away happy.
You're being too greedy, I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to let you take advantage of me.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up everything. Let's be reasonable and end this game.
You're still not giving me enough, I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up yet.
